mapper.select: SELECT a.auth_ip, a.auth_api, a.busi_name FROM t_gq_fss_api_business a WHERE a.busi_code = #{busiCode}
SELECT a.ip_address, a.type, a.create_time, a.modify_time, a.mchn_no FROM t_gq_fss_mchn_ipconfig a WHERE a.mchn_no = #{mchnNo}
SELECT a.api_url apiUrl, a.api_no apiNo, b.mchn_no mchnNo, a.api_name apiName, b.modify_time modifyTime FROM t_gq_fss_api a,t_gq_fss_mchn_api b where a.api_no=b.api_no AND b.mchn_no=#{mchnNo}
SELECT a.busi_code,a.api_addr FROM t_gq_fss_api_addr a WHERE a.mchn_no = #{mchnNo}

SELECT a.id, a.mchn_name mchnName, a.mchn_no mchnNo, a.parent_id parentId, a.parent_no parentNo, a.mchn_key mchnKey, a.mchn_key_end_date mchnKeyEndDate, a.auth_ip authIp, a.auth_api authApi, a.create_time createTime, a.modify_time modifyTime, a.state FROM t_gq_fss_mchn a where 1=1
mapper.delete: DELETE from t_gq_fss_api WHERE api_no in (SELECT api_no from t_gq_fss_mchn_api WHERE mchn_no=#{mchnNo} )
